titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-572, by Mr. Reynolds.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 201.

bill.summary: 4/11/2000--Introduced. Makes it in order at any time on or before April 14, 2000, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules.
